snippet.title: Highway open after motorbike, truck crash
snippet.content:
THE Cunningham Hwy at Purga has reopened following a traffic crash involving a truck and a motorcyclist early this morning.
The crash happened shortly after 6.30am and closed the highway between Yamanto and Middle Rd.
The male motorcyclist was taken to Ipswich Hospital in a stable condition with leg and chest injuries.
The highway was closed for less than half an hour but it has since opened to traffic.
